text: Ron Gourlay is the Chief Executive of Chelsea Football Club. He took the position on 31 October 2009, Before he was Chief Operating Officer of the club. ==Chelsea FC== Ron Gourlay has worked at Chelsea for 5 years. He previously worked for Manchester United and Umbro. He was appointed the chief executive of Chelsea on 17 September 2009. He began there after Peter Kenyon's left the club on 31 October 2009.Chelsea announce Gourlay as Kenyon's replacement ESPN soccernet, 17 September 2009 He was quoted as saying: "It is a huge honour to be offered the chance to lead Chelsea".News in Brief - Fri 18th Sept FA Premier League, 18 September 2009 "We have a fantastic team both on and off the field and those teams can move us on to even greater success in the future.
